Detailed Description

Callback object for an incomming data channel.

virtual void hss1394::ChannelListener::Process ( const uint8 *  pBuffer,
uint  uBufferSize 
) [inline, virtual]

the data. On completion of this call, pBuffer is no longer valid. This call will occur inside a separate thread. The implementer must ensure concurrency control issues are dealt with.
